dw:transform-message.doc:name: Transform Message
dw:transform-message.dw:set-payload: %dw 1.0 %output application/java --- payload map ((payload01 , indexOfPayload01) -> { Name: payload01.name, BillingStreet: payload01.street, BillingCity: payload01.city, BillingState: payload01.state, BillingPostalCode: payload01.postal, BillingCountry: payload01.country })

sfdc:query.query: dsql:SELECT Name FROM Account WHERE Name = '#[payload.Name]'
